<ec><eb><ec><ed>(raw data)<9c> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <ed><ec><ec> <eb><ec><ed> 분석<ec> <ec><ed><ed><a0> 분석결과<bc> <ec>각화<ed><eb> 방법<ec> <ed><ec><ed> 것이<eb>.

## RStudio <ec><9c>

<ec><ed><ed><ec><ec> 카펜<ed><ac> R교육<ec> <ec><ec> 것을 <ed><ec><ed><eb><eb>.

<ec><88> R <ec><ec><ec>간을 <ed><ed><ec>, R <ec><ec> 기본<b0> 뿐만 <ec><eb><eb> <ec><a0><eb><ec> <ec><eb> <ec>(make your life easier)<ec> 가<eb><ed><9d>
과학 <ed>로젝<ed><ec> 코드<bc> 구조<ed><ed><eb> 모범 <ed><ec><ec>례<eb> 교육<ed><eb>.

<eb>구로 RStudio <bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>: <ec><ec>로이 <ec><ec>가<eb><ed><a0>, 무료<ec><b0>, <ec><ed> <ec><ec>
R<bc> <ed><ed><eb> 개발 <ed>경을 <ec>공한<eb>.
RStudio<eb> <ed>집기가 <eb><ec><eb><ec> <ec><a0>, (<ec><84> <ed><ed>) 모든 <ed><eb><ed><ec><ec> <eb><ec><ed><a0>,
버젼 <ec><ec> <8f> <ed>로젝<ed> 관<ac> 같<9d> 많<9d> <ec><ec> 기능<ec> <ec>공한<eb>.

**기본 배치**

RStudio<bc> 처음 <ec><8c> <eb><b4>, <bd> 3개<b0> 반갑<8c> <ec><eb>분을 맞이<ed><eb>:

  * <ec><ed><eb><ed><8c> R 콘솔 : 좌측 <ec><b4>
  * <ec><ec>공간(Workspace)/<ec><eb> (History) : <ec>측상<eb> <ed>

## RStudio <eb>부 <ec><ec><ed><84>

RStudio <eb>부<ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb> 방식<ec> <ed><8c> <eb>가지 <ec><eb>.

1. <ec><ed><eb><ed><8c> R 콘솔<ec><ec> <ed><ec><ed><ed><a0> 가지<a0> <eb><86><eb>가, <eb>중에 <ec><ed><ed> `.R` <ed><ec><ec> 복사<ed><ec> 붙여<eb><eb><eb>.
   *  초기 <ec><ec><ed><a0> <ec><ec><9d> <ed><ec><ed><bc> <ed> <eb> <ec> <ec><eb><ed><eb>.
   * <ec><ec><ed><8c> <eb><eb> 집약<ec><ec> 개발<ec> <eb><eb>.
2. `.R` <ed><ec><ec><ec> <ec><ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed><a0>, RStudio 명령<ec>/<eb>축키<bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> 
<ed><ec> <eb><ec>, <ec><ed><eb> <eb><ec> <ed><ec><9d> 변경된 <eb><ec><ec> <ec><ed><eb><ed><8c> R 콘솔<ec> 밀<ec><eb><ec> <ec><ed><ed><eb>.
   * <ec><ec><ed><eb> 매우 <ed><ad><ed> 방식<ec><eb>; <ec><ec><eb> 모든 코드가 <eb>중에 <ec><a0><ec><eb><eb>.
   * RStudio <eb>부 <ed><ec><9d> R `source()` <ed><ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <ec><ec><ed> <ed><ec><ec> <ec><ed><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.

> ## Tip: 코드 <ec>부 <ec><ed><ed><b0>
>
> <ed>집기 창에<ec> 코드<bc> <ec><ed><ed><eb><eb> <ec><ec> <ec><eb><ed> <ec><ec><ec><ec> RStudio가 <ec>공한<eb>.
> 버튼, 메뉴, <ed>보드 <eb>축키, <ec>가지 방식<ec> <ec><eb>.
> <ed><ec> <eb><ec><ec> <ec><ed><ed><eb><b4>,
> 
> 1. <ed>집기<bd> <ec><eb> `Run` 버튼<ec> <ed><ad><ed><eb>.
> 2. "Code" 메뉴<ec><ec> "Run Lines" <bc> <ec><ed><ed><eb>.
> 3. 리눅<ec> <ed><ec><9d> <ec><eb><ec><ec><ec> `Ctrl+<ec><ed>`(<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Return</kbd>), <a5> OS X<ec><ec> `Command+<ec><ed>`(<kbd>&#8984;</kbd>+<kbd>Return</kbd>) <eb>축키<bc> <eb>른다.
> (<eb>축키<eb> 버튼 <ec><ec> 마우<ec><bc> <ec>리면 <bc> <ec> <ec><eb>).
> 
> 코드 블록<ec> <ec><ed><ed><eb><b4>, 코드 블록<ec> <ec><ed><ed><a0> <eb><ec>, `Run` 버튼<ec> <eb>른다.
> 방금<ec><ec> <ec><ed><ed> 코드 블록 <eb>부 <ec>부 코드<bc> 변경했<eb><b4>,
> <eb><ec> 코드 블록<ec> <ec><ed><ed><a0>, `Run` 버튼<ec> <eb><bc> <ed><ec>가 <ec><eb>.
> 바로 <ec><ec> <ec><eb> 버튼(`Re-run the previous region`)<ec> <eb>르면 <eb><eb>.
> <ec> 버튼<ec><9d> 방금<ec><ec> 변경한 <eb><ec><ec> <ed><ed><ed><ec> <ec><ec> 코드 블록<ec> <ec><ed><ec><ed><eb>.
{: .callout}

## R <ec><9c>

R<ec><ec> <ec><eb><ed> <ec>간을 R <ec><ed><eb><ed><8c> 콘솔<ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb>.
<ec>곳이 <ec><eb>분이 <ec><ec><ed> 모든 코드<bc> <ec><ed><ed><eb> 곳으<9c>
R <ec><ed>립트 <ed><ec><ec> 추<b0><ed><b0> <ec><ec>, <ec><ec><eb><ec><bc> <ec><ed><ed><eb> <ec><ec><ed> <ed>경이<eb>.
RStudio 콘솔<ec><9d> `R` 명령-<eb><ec> <ed>경에<ec> <ec><eb><ed><eb> 곳과 <eb><ec><ed><eb>.

R <ec><ed><eb><ed><8c> <ec><ec><ec><ec> 보게 <eb><eb> 첫번<b8> <ec><ed><ec><9d> <ec>보<b0> <89> <eb><ec><a0> <eb><ec>,
">" 가 <eb><ed><83><eb><a0> 커서가 깜빡<ec><eb>.
<ec><eb>가지 면에<ec>, <ec> <ec><ec><ec>간에 <ed><ec><ed> <ec> <ed>경과 <ec><ec><ed><eb>:
**REPL** 루프(<ec><a0>, <ed>가<ed><a0>, 출력<ed><eb> 루프) 기본 <ec><ec><eb><ec> <ec><ec><ec> <eb><ec><ed><eb>.
명령<ec><bc> <ec><eb><ed><b4>, R<ec> 명령<ec><bc> <ec><ed><ed><a0> <eb><ec>, 결과<bc> 반환<ed><eb>.

## 계산기로 R <ec><ec><ed><b0>

R<9c> <ed> <ec> <ec><eb> 가<ec> 간단<ed> 것이 <ec><ec><eb>:


~~~
1 + 100
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 101
~~~
{: .output}

R<ec> "[1]" <eb><ec><ec> <ec><eb><ec> 출력<ed><eb>.
지<88> <eb><ec> "[1]"<ec> <eb><8c><ed> 걱정<ed>지 말자. <eb>중에 <ec>명이 <eb><ec><99> <ec><eb>.
지금<9d> <ec><eb> 출력결과<bc> 지<ad><ed><eb><a0> <ec>각한<eb>.

배쉬(bash) 처럼, 불완<ec><ed> 명령<ec><bc> <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, R<ec><9d> <ec><ec><ec>가 명령<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed> <eb>까<a7> <eb><8c>기한<eb>:

~~~
> 1 +
~~~
{: .r}

~~~
+
~~~
{: .output}


`1+` <eb><ec><ec> `<ec><ed>`<bc> 치게<eb><b4>, R <ec><ec><ec> ">" <eb><8c><ec><ec> "+" <ec> 보여준<eb>.
<ec>것이 <ec>미하<eb> 바는 명령<ec>가 <ec><ec><eb> <eb>까<a7> <eb><8c>기한<eb><eb> 것이<eb>.
명령<ec><bc> 취소<ed>고자 <ed><eb><b4>, <eb><ec><ed> "Esc" <ed><bc> 치게 <eb><b4>, <eb><ec> ">" <ed>롬프<ed><9c> <eb><eb><ec> 간다.

> ## Tip: 명령<b8> 취소
>
> RStudio가 <ec><eb><a0> R 명령-<eb><ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed><a0> <ec><eb><b4>, 명령문을 취소<ed><eb><eb> 
> `ESC` <eb><8c><ec><ec> `Ctrl+C`(<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>C</kbd>) <ec><ec><ec> <ed><ec><ed><eb>.
> <eb><ed>, <ec><eb> <ec><ec><ec><9d> <a5> <ec><ec><ec><ec><eb> <eb><ec><ed><8c> <ec><ec><eb><eb>!
>
> 명령<ec> 취소<eb> 불완<ec><eb> 명령<ec><bc> 종료<ec><ed><eb><eb> 그다지 <ec><ec><ed>지<eb> <ec><eb>:
> 명령<ec> 취소 기능<ec> <ec><ed><eb><a0> <ec><eb> 코드<bc> 멈추<eb><eb><eb> <ec><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
> (<ec><bc> <eb><ec>, <ec><ec><ed> 것보<eb> <ed><ec> <eb> <ec><eb> <ec>간이 <ec><ec><eb><eb> 경우)
> <ed><ec><9d> <ed><ec> <ec><ec><ed><a0> <ec><eb> 코드<bc> <ec>거할 <eb><eb> <ec><ec><ed><eb>.
>
{: .callout}

계산기로 R<ec> <ec><ec><ed> <eb>, <ec><ec> <ec><ec><eb> 초중<eb><ed>교에<ec> 배운 것과 <eb><ec><ed><eb>.

가<ec> <ec><ec><ec><ec>가 <eb><ec><9d> 것<b6><ed> <eb><ec><9d> <ec><ec><eb> <eb><ec><bc> 같다:

 * 괄호: `(`, `)`
 * 멱승: `^` or `**`
 * <eb><eb><ec>: `/`
 * 곱셈: `*`
 * <eb><ec>: `+`
 * 뺄셈: `-`


~~~
3 + 5 * 2
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 13
~~~
{: .output}

괄호<bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <ec><ec><ec><ec><ec> <ed><eb> 묶는<eb>, 
<ec><ec><eb> <ec><eb><ed> 바<a5><bc> 명확<ed> <ed>거나, 기본<ec><ec><bc> 차이가 <eb> <eb> <ed>가<ec><ec><bc> 강제<ed><b0> <ec><ed><ec><eb>.


~~~
(3 + 5) * 2
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 16
~~~
{: .output}

<ad> <ed><ec><ed>지 <ec><ec> <eb> 괄호가 <ec><ec><eb><b4> <ec><b0> <ed><eb><ec> 지기도 <ed>지<8c>,
<ec><eb><bc> 명확<ed> <ed><eb>.
<eb>중에 <ec><eb>분이 <ec><ec><ed> 코드<bc> <eb><b8> <ec><eb><ec> <ec><8c> <eb><ec> 기억<ed><eb>.



~~~
(3 + (5 * (2 ^ 2))) # hard to read
3 + 5 * 2 ^ 2       # clear, if you remember the rules
3 + 5 * (2 ^ 2)     # if you forget some rules, this might help
~~~
{: .language-r}


<ec><b0> 코드 <81> <eb><ec> <eb><ec> <ed><ec><ed><bc> "주석"<ec><eb><a0> 부른다.
<ed><ec>(<ed><ec><9d> 번호기호)기호 `#` <eb><ec><ec> <ec><eb> 모든 것<9d> 코드가 <ec><ed><eb> <eb> R<ec><ec> 무시<eb><eb>.

매우 <ec>거나 <ed> <ec><ec><eb> 과학 <ed>기법<ec> <eb>른다:


~~~
2/10000
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 2e-04
~~~
{: .output}

<ec><b0> <ed>기법<ec><9d> `10^XX` 곱한 것을 축약<ed> 것이<eb>.
<eb><eb><ec>, `2e-4`<ec><9d> `2 * 10^(-4)`<ec> 축약<ed> 것이<eb>.

<ec><ec><bc> 과학 <ed>기법<ec><9c> <ec><ec><ed> <ec><eb> <ec><eb>:


~~~
5e3  # Note the lack of minus here
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 5000
~~~
{: .output}

## <ec><ed> <ed><ec>

R<ec><eb> <ec>많<9d> <eb><ec> <ec><ed><ed><ec>가 존재<ed><eb>.
<ed><ec><bc> <ed>출하<eb><b4>, <ed><ec>명을 <eb><ec><ed> <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><a0>,
괄호<bc> <ec><a0> <eb><ec><b4> <eb><eb>. 
괄호<ec><ec> <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><eb> 것을 *<ed><ec> <ec><ec>*<eb><a0> 부른다:



~~~
sin(1)  # <U+FFFD>각<U+FFFD>수
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 0.841471
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
log(1)  # <U+FFFD>연로그
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 0
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
log10(10) # 지<U+FFFD><U+FFFD> 10<U+FFFD><U+FFFD> 로그
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 1
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
exp(0.5) # e^(1/2)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 1.648721
~~~
{: .output}

R<ec> <eb><ec> <ed><ec> 모두<bc> 기억<ed><ec> <eb><eb><eb> 걱정<ec><9d> <ed>지마라.
구<b8><ec><eb> <eb><ec><84>, <eb><ec><ec><ec> 검<ec><ed><b4> <eb><eb>.
<ed><ec><85> <ec> 글<ec><bc> 기억<ed><a0> <ec><eb><b4> RStudio<ec><ec> <ed> <ec><eb><ec><ec> 기능<ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb>.

<ed> <ec><eb><ec><ec><ec> R <ec><b4> <ec>진보<eb> RStudio가 <ec><ec><ec><ec> 갖는 분야<9c>,
<ec><eb><ec><ec> 기능<ec> <ed><ec>, <ed><ec> <ec><ec>, <ed><ec>가 <ec><eb>받을 <ec> <ec><eb> 값을 <eb> <ec><8c> 찾을 <ec> <ec><8c> <ed><eb>.

명령<b8> <ec><ec> `?`<ec> <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><a0> <ec><ed><bc> 치면 <ed><eb> 명령<ec><ec> <eb><8c><ed> <eb><ec><9b><90> <ed><ec>지가 <ec>린다.
명령<ec><ec> <eb><8c><ed> 기술<bc> <eb><ec>방식<ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ec>보<a5><bc> <ec>공할 뿐만 <ec><eb><eb>,
<eb><ec><9b><90> <ed><ec>지 <ed><eb><ec><9c> <ec><ed>롤해<ec> <89> <eb>리면 <ed><eb> 명령<ec> <ec><ec>법을 <ec><ec><ed><eb> 
코드 <ec><ec>가 <eb><ec><99> <ec><eb>. <eb>중에 <ec><ec><bc> <ed><ed><ec> <ec><ed><bc> 것이<eb>.


## <eb><ec><ed> 객체 비교<ed><b0>

R<ec><ec> 비교 <ec><ec><eb> <ec><ed><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>:


~~~
1 == 1  # 같음 ("is equal to"<U+FFFD> <U+FFFD>음)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
1 != 2  # 같<U+FFFD> <U+FFFD>음 ("is not equal to"<U+FFFD> <U+FFFD>음)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
1 <  2  # 보다 <U+FFFD>음
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
1 <= 1  # <U+FFFD>거<U+FFFD><U+FFFD> 같음
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
1 > 0  # 보다 <U+FFFD><U+FFFD>
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}


~~~
1 >= -9 # 같거<U+FFFD><U+FFFD> <U+FFFD><U+FFFD>
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] TRUE
~~~
{: .output}

> ## Tip: <ec><ec> 비교 
>
> <ec><ec> 비교<ed> <eb> 주의 <ec><ed>: <ec><ec>가 <ec><eb> 경우, <ec><eb><8c><9c> `==` 비교<bc> <ec><ec><ed>지 <ec><eb><eb>.
> <ec><ec><eb> 구체<ec><ec><9c> <ec><ec><ec><8c> <ed><ed><ed> <ec> <ec><eb> <ec>료형<ec><eb>.
>
> 컴퓨<ed><eb> <ec><ec> <ec><ed><eb><bc> 갖는 <ec><ec><8c> <ed><ed><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
> 그래<ec>, R<9c> 출력<ed> <eb> 같아 보이<eb> <eb> <ec><ec><eb> <ec><ec> 겉으<9c> <eb><eb><eb>지 <ec><eb> 
> <ed><ed><ec> <eb><bc> <ec> <ec><eb>. 
> <eb><eb><ec>, <ec><ec><9d> <ec>차범<ec>(컴퓨<ed> <ed><ec><ec><a8>, Machine Numberic Tolerance)만큼 차이가 <eb><eb>
>
> <eb><8c><ec><ec>, `all.equal` <ed><ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>.
>
> <ec><ec><ed> <ec><ed><ec><9d> [http://floating-point-gui.de/](http://floating-point-gui.de/) <ec><ec><ec><ed> 참조.
>
{: .callout}

## 변<ec><ec><99> <eb><8c><ec>

<ed><eb> <ec><ec><ec>(Assignment Operator), `<-`<bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> 변<ec><ec> 값을 <ec><a0><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
<ec><bc> <eb><ec>:


~~~
x <- 1/40
~~~
{: .language-r}

변<ec><ec> <ed><eb><ed><b4>, 값을 출력<ed>지 <ec><ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb>.
<eb><8c><ec><ec>, <eb>중에 <ec><ec><ed><eb><a0> **변<ec>**<eb><eb> 곳에 <ec><a0><ec><ed><eb>.
`x` 변<ec><ec><eb> **<92>** `0.025`가 <eb>겨있<eb>:


~~~
x
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 0.025
~~~
{: .output}

좀<eb> 구체<ec><ec><9c>, <ec><a0><ec><eb> 값<9d> [부<eb><ec><ec><ec> <ec>](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floating_point)<eb><a0> 불리<eb>
<ed><eb> 분수<bc> *<ec><ec> 근사*<ed> 것이<eb>.

RStudio <ec><a1> <ec><eb> 창에<ec> `Environment` <ed><ec> <ed><ad><ed><b4>,
변<ec>`x`<ec><99> 값이 <ec><a0><ec><eb> 것을 <ed><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
변<ec> `x`<eb> <ec><ec>가 <ec><ec><eb><eb> <ec><eb> <ec><ec><ec><ec><ec><eb> <ec><ec><ec>리에 <ec><ec><eb> <ec> <ec><eb>:



~~~
log(x)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] -3.688879
~~~
{: .output}

변<ec>가 <eb><ec> <ed><eb><eb> <ec><eb> <ec><ec><ec> 주목<ed><eb>:


~~~
x <- 100
~~~
{: .language-r}

`x` 변<ec><ec> 0.025 값이 <eb>겼<a7><8c>, <ed><ec><eb> <eb><b4> 값이 `100` <ec> <eb><eb>.

변<ec><ec> <eb><8c><ec><eb><eb> 값에<eb> <eb><8c><ec><eb><eb> 변<ec><eb> <ed><ed><eb> <ec> <ec><eb>:


~~~
x <- x + 1 # <U+FFFD>측 <U+FFFD>단 <U+FFFD><U+FFFD><U+FFFD><U+FFFD> RStudio가 x<U+FFFD><U+FFFD> <U+FFFD><U+FFFD><U+FFFD> <U+FFFD>보가 <U+FFFD>떻<U+FFFD> 바뀌는지 주목<U+FFFD>다.
~~~
{: .language-r}

<ed><eb><ed><eb> <ec>측편<ec><9d> <ec><eb> <ec>법한 R <ed><ed><ec><eb> <eb> <ec> <ec><eb>.
<ec>측편<ec><9d> <eb><8c><ec><ec> <ec><ec><eb><b0> <ec><ec> *<ec><ec><ed> <ed>가*가 <ec>루어 진다.

변<ec>명에<eb> 문자, <ec><ec>, 밑줄, 구두<ec><ec> <ed><ed><eb> <ec> <ec><eb>.
변<ec>명이 <ec><ec><9c> <ec><ec><eb>거나, 공백<ec> <ec><ec><b4> <ec><eb><eb>.
<ec><eb>마다 <b4> 변<ec>명에 <eb><8c><ed> <eb><b8> 관례<bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>. <eb><ec><ec> 관례가 <eb><ec><99><ec><eb>.

  * <eb><ec>.<ec><ec>.구두<ec>
  * <eb><ec>_<ec><ec>_밑줄
  * <eb><ed><83><eb><8c>문자 : camelCaseToSeparateWords

<ec><eb> 관례<bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb> <ec><eb><84> 취향<ec>지<8c>, **<ec>관<ec><ec> <ec>지<ed><eb>**.

변<ec><ec> <eb><8c><ec><ed> <eb>, <ed><eb> `=` <ec><ec><ec> <ec><ec><eb> 가<eb><ed><eb>:


~~~
x = 1/40
~~~
{: .language-r}

<ed>지<8c>, R <ec><ec><ec> <ec><ec> 그다지 많이 <ed><ec><eb>지 <ec><eb><eb>.
가<ec> 중요<ed> 것<9d> <ec><ec><ed><eb> <ec><ec><ec><ec> **<ec>관<ec> <ec>지**<ed><eb>.
`=` 보다 `<-`<ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb> 것이 <eb> <ed><eb><ec><eb><ec> 경우가 <ec><a0>,
커<ae>니<ed><ec><ec> 가<ec> <ed><ed> <ec><ec><eb><eb> 기호<eb>. 그래<ec> 추천<ed><eb> 것<9d> `<-` <ec><eb>.


> ## Challenge 1
>
> <eb><ec> <91> <ec>법한 R 변<ec>명<9d> <ec><eb>것인가?
> 
> ~~~
> min_height
> max.height
> _age
> .mass
> MaxLength
> min-length
> 2widths
> celsius2kelvin
> ~~~
> {: .language-r}
>
> > ## Solution to challenge 1
> >
> > <eb><ec> <ec>례<eb> R 변<ec><9c> <ec><ec><eb> <ec> <ec><eb>:
> > 
> > ~~~
> > min_height
> > max.height
> > MaxLength
> > celsius2kelvin
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> >
> > <eb><ec><ec><9d> <ec><ec><9d> 변<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>:
> > 
> > ~~~
> > .mass
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> >
> > <eb><ec><ec><9d> 변<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb><eb> <ec><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>:
> > 
> > ~~~
> > _age
> > min-length
> > 2widths
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> {: .solution}
{: .challenge}

## 벡터<ed>(Vectorization)

<ec>지<ed><ec> <eb><eb> 마<a7><89> <ec><ed><ec><9d> R<ec><9d> `벡터<ed>`<eb><ec><eb><eb> <ec><ec><ec><eb>.
변<ec><ec><99> <ed><ec><eb> 값으<9c> 벡터<bc> 갖을 <ec> <ec><eb><eb> <ec>미다. <ec><bc> <eb><ec>,


~~~
1:5
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] 1 2 3 4 5
~~~
{: .output}



~~~
2^(1:5)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1]  2  4  8 16 32
~~~
{: .output}



~~~
x <- 1:5
2^x
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1]  2  4  8 16 32
~~~
{: .output}

<eb><86><eb><eb><9d> 강력<ed> 기능<ec><eb>; <ec><ec><ec> <eb><8c><ed>, <eb><ec> <ec><ec><ec><ec> 좀<eb> 깊이 <eb><b0> <ec><ec><ec><eb>.


## <ed><bd> <ec><ec>

R <ec><ec><bc> <ec><ed><ec><ec><ed> <eb> <ec><ec><eb><eb> 몇<b0>지 <ec><ec><ed> 명령<ec>가 <ec><eb>.

`ls` 명령<ec><eb> <ec><ec><ed><bd>(<ec><ec><ed><a0> <ec><eb> R <ec><ec>)<ec> <ec><a0><ec><eb> 모든 변<ec><ec><99> <ed><ec> 목록<ec> 출력<ed><eb>:



~~~
ls()
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
[1] "x" "y"
~~~
{: .output}

> ## Tip: <ec><b4> 객체 
>
> <ec><eb><ec> <ec>처럼, `ls`<eb> 기본<eb><ed><ed> <ec><ec><ec><9c> "."<ec><9c> <ec><ec><eb><eb> <ed><ec><ec><99> 변<ec><bc> <ec>긴다.
> 모든 객체 목록<ec> 보려<b4>, `ls(all.names=TRUE)` <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4> <eb><eb>.
>
{.callout}

<ec>기서 `ls` 명령<ec><ec> <ec><eb> <ec><ec><eb> <ec><eb><ed>지 <ec><ec><ec><ec> 주목<ed><eb>.
<ed>지<8c>, R<ec> <ed><ec><bc> <ed>출하<eb><b4> 괄호<eb> <ec><ec><ed> <ec><eb><ed><ec> <eb><eb>.

`ls`<8c> <b8> <ec>체로 <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, R<ec><9d> <ed><eb> <ed><ec><ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ec><ec>코드<8c> 출력<ed><eb>!


~~~
ls
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
function (name, pos = -1L, envir = as.environment(pos), all.names = FALSE, 
    pattern, sorted = TRUE) 
{
    if (!missing(name)) {
        pos <- tryCatch(name, error = function(e) e)
        if (inherits(pos, "error")) {
            name <- substitute(name)
            if (!is.character(name)) 
                name <- deparse(name)
            warning(gettextf("%s converted to character string", 
                sQuote(name)), domain = NA)
            pos <- name
        }
    }
    all.names <- .Internal(ls(envir, all.names, sorted))
    if (!missing(pattern)) {
        if ((ll <- length(grep("[", pattern, fixed = TRUE))) && 
            ll != length(grep("]", pattern, fixed = TRUE))) {
            if (pattern == "[") {
                pattern <- "\\["
                warning("replaced regular expression pattern '[' by  '\\\\['")
            }
            else if (length(grep("[^\\\\]\\[<-", pattern))) {
                pattern <- sub("\\[<-", "\\\\\\[<-", pattern)
                warning("replaced '[<-' by '\\\\[<-' in regular expression pattern")
            }
        }
        grep(pattern, all.names, value = TRUE)
    }
    else all.names
}
<bytecode: 0x0000023d7e3d4950>
<environment: namespace:base>
~~~
{: .output}

`rm` 명령<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <eb><ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed> <ed><ec>가 <ec><eb> 객체<bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>:


~~~
rm(x)
~~~
{: .language-r}

<ec><ec> <ed>경에 <eb><b4> 많<9d> 객체가 <ec><a0>, <ec>부 <ec><ec><ed>고자 <ed><eb><b4>,
`rm` <ed><ec><ec> `ls` 결과<bc> <ec><eb><ed><b4> <eb><eb>:


~~~
rm(list = ls())
~~~
{: .language-r}

<ec><b0> <ec><ec><ec><ec>, 명령<ec> <eb>개<a5><bc> 조합<ed><eb>.
<ec><ec> <ec><ec><ec><ec>처럼, 가<ec><ec><bd> 괄호 <eb>부<ec> <ec><eb> 것이 먼<a0> <ed>가<eb><a0>, <89> <ec><ec><ec> <ed>가<eb><eb>.

<ec><b0> <ec><ec><ec><ec>, `ls` 결과가 `rm` <ec><ec> 명령<ec> `list` <ec><ec><9c> <ec><ec><eb><eb><9d> 지<ec><ed><eb>.
값을 <ec>름으<9c> <ec><ec><ec> <ed><eb><ed> <eb>, `=` <ec><ec><ec><bc> *<ec><ec><ed><ec><8c>* <ed><eb>!

<eb><8c><ec><ec> `<-`가 <ec><ec><eb><b4>, <ec><eb><ed>지 못한 <ec><ed>과<b0> 발생<eb>거나, <ec><98> 메시지<8c> <ec><8c> <eb><eb>:


~~~
rm(list <- ls())
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in rm(list <- ls()): ... must contain names or character strings
~~~
{: .error}

> ## Tip: 경고 vs. <ec><98> 
>
> R<ec> <ec><ec><ed>지 못한 무언가 <ec><ed><ed> <eb> 주위<bc> 기울<ec><eb>!
> R<ec> <ec><ec><ec><ec><ec> <eb><ec><ec> 진행<ed> <ec> <ec><ec> <eb> <ec>기<99> 같이 <ec>류<a5><bc> <eb>진다.
> <eb><b8> <ed><ed><ec><9c> 경고<eb> <ec>반적<ec><9c> <ed><ec><eb> <ec><ed><eb><eb>. <ed>지<8c>,
> <ed><ec><eb> <ec>마도 <ec><ec><ed> 것처<eb> <eb><ec><ed>지 <ec><ec> 것이<eb>.
> 
> <eb>가지 경우 <af>, R<ec> 출력<ed><ec> <ec><ed>주는 메시지가 문제 <ed>결에 <eb><8c><ed> <eb><ec><bc> <84> 것이<eb>.
>
{.callout}


## R <ed><ed>지

<ed><ed>지<bc> <ec><ec><ed>거나, <eb>군<b0> <ec><ec><ed> <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec><ec> R<ec> <ed><ec>추<b0><eb> 가<eb><ed><eb>.
<ed> <ec><a0><ec><ec><ec><ec>, CRAN(comprehensive R archive network)<ec><eb> 13,000<9c> <ec><ec> <ed><ed>지가 <ec><eb>.
R<bc> RStudio 모두 <ed><ed>지 관<ac> 기능<ec> <ec><eb>:

* `installed.packages()` <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, <ec><eb> <ed><ed>지가 <ec>치되<ec> <ec><eb>지 <ed><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
* `install.packages("packagename")` <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec>치할 <ec> <ec><eb>.
   <ec>기서 `packagename`<ec><9d> <ed><ed>지명칭<ec> <eb><eb>.
* `update.packages()` <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, <ec>치된 <ed><ed>지<bc> 갱신<ed> <ec> <ec><eb>.
* `remove.packages("packagename")` <ed><83><ec><ed><ed><b4>, <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec>거한<eb>.
* `library(packagename)` 명령<ec><9c> <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec><ec><ed> <ec> <ec><8c> <ed><eb>.


> ## <eb><ec>과제 2
>
> <eb><ec> <ed>로그<eb><ec> <eb><ec> <81> 문장<ec> <ec><ed><ed><8c> <eb><b4>, <81> 변<ec> 값에<eb> 무슨 값이 <eb>겨있<ec>까요?
>
> 
> ~~~
> mass <- 47.5
> age <- 122
> mass <- mass * 2.3
> age <- age - 20
> ~~~
> {: .language-r}
>
> > ## <eb><ec>과제 2<ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ed><eb>
> >
> > 
> > ~~~
> > mass <- 47.5
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> >
> > <ec><ed><ed><8c> <eb><b4> mass 변<ec><ec> 47.5 값이 배정<eb><eb>.
> >
> > 
> > ~~~
> > age <- 122
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> >
> > age 변<ec><ec> 122  값이 배정<eb><eb>.
> >
> > 
> > ~~~
> > mass <- mass * 2.3
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> > 
> > <ec><b0> 문장<ec><9d> 2.3<ec> 47.5 <ec> 곱하<ec> mass 변<ec><ec> 
> > 109.25 값이 배정<eb><eb>.
> >
> > 
> > ~~~
> > age <- age - 20
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> > 
> > 기존 변<ec> age 122 값에 20<ec> 빼서 변<ec> age<ec><eb> 102 값이 <ed><eb><eb><eb>.
> {: .solution}
{: .challenge}


> ## <eb><ec>과제 3
>
> <ec><ec> <eb><ec>과제 코드<bc> <ec><ed><ed><a0> <eb> <ed>, mass<ec><99> age<bc> 비교<ed><eb> 코드<bc> <ec><ec><ed><eb>. 
> mass<ec><99> age <91> <ec><eb> 것이 <eb> <ed>가?
>
> > ## <eb><ec>과제 3<ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ed><eb>
> >
> > <ec><b0> 질문<ec> <eb><ed><eb> 방식<ec><9d> <eb><ec><bc> 같이 `>` <ec> <ec><ec><ed><eb> 것이<eb>:
> > 
> > ~~~
> > mass > age
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > ~~~
> > [1] TRUE
> > ~~~
> > {: .output}
> > 109.25 가 102 보다 <ed> 경우 TRUE<bc> 반환<ed><eb>.
> {: .solution}
{: .challenge}


> ## <eb><ec>과제 4
>
> mass<ec><99> age 변<ec><bc> 지<ec><ec> <ec><ec><ed>경을 <ad><ec><ed><ec>.
>
> > ## <eb><ec>과제 4<ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ed><eb>
> >
> > `rm` 명령<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <ad><ec> <ec><ec><ec> <ec><ed><ed><eb>.
> > 
> > ~~~
> > rm(age, mass)
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
> {: .solution}
{: .challenge}

> ## <eb><ec>과제 5
>
> `ggplot2`, `plyr`, `gapminder` <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec>치하<eb>.
>
> > ## <eb><ec>과제 5<ec> <eb><8c><ed> <ed><eb>
> >
> > `install.packages()` 명령<ec><bc> <ec><ec><ed><ec> <ed><ed>지<bc> <ec>치한<eb>.
> > 
> > ~~~
> > install.packages("ggplot2")
> > install.packages("plyr")
> > install.packages("gapminder")
> > ~~~
> > {: .language-r}
